title: Judge Dark Skin Tone
description: A person depicted as a judge, wearing a robe and holding scales of justice, with a dark skin tone. This emoji represents fairness, justice, law, and making decisions.

Their expression is one of thoughtful solemnity, conveying authority and impartiality with a slight hint of wisdom.
